lyric.verse: Toshi no kazu dake no Akai hana kara For every year I've lived Tsumitorimashou Itami no toge wo Ohana wo ukabeta Ofuro no naka de Iki wo hisomete wa Sono ashioto ni obieteiru no
lyric.chorus: Dakinareta kono karada wo Sagashitari shinaide
lyric.verse: Kioku wo keshitai Anata no aji wo Wasurete shimaitai Umarekawaru no umarekawaru no
lyric.chorus: Kizutsuketa kono karada wo Sagashitari shinaide
lyric.verse: Kamisama ga Moshi iru no nara Anata wo tsukiotoseba ii noni Watashi no kage mo Watashi no yume mo Musaboritsuku shita deshou? Nani wo nozomu no? Nani wo inoru no?
lyric.chorus: Dakinareta kono karada wo Sagashitari shinaide Kizutsuketa kono karada wo Sagashitari shinaide Haki suteta kotoba nado Fumi tsubushite keshite
lyric.verse: Mou koko ni wa nani mo Nokotte nai no Nani mo nai no yo Tada hakike ga suru no

translator.translatorname: Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy, Goshi Manabe

lyric.verse: Counting red flowers For every year I've lived Let us pick The thorns of pain In the bath The petals flowing I kill my breath Those footsteps haunt me
lyric.chorus: Don't search for this body The one you know so well
lyric.verse: Let me erase The taste from your mouth Let me forget I will live again, I will live again
lyric.chorus: Don't search for this body The one you hurt so much
lyric.verse: If God exists He should smash you down My shadows My dreams Have all been devoured What do you want? What more do you pray for?
lyric.chorus: Don't search for this body The one you know so well Don't search for this body The one you hurt so much Crush those uttered words And erase them
lyric.verse: There's nothing left Nothing I just feel like puking
